message.body: Did you decide what to get Mom for Christmas?
I think I'm going to get her a vitamix. It's really expensive if you want to go in on it
I can help, if you'd like. It would be around 200 each, right.

I'm hoping to get it for closer to 300. I paid less than that for mine but I had a coupon and it wasn't Christmas when I got it. I was going to wait and try to get it in Jacksonville so you've got some time if you want to think about it
O.K. I'mup for it. I'll bringa bed, bath, and beyond coupon.
